recipe_name: Salad of chicory and orange segments
author: Nick Nairn
method: Place all the ingredients into a bowl and mix well.  To serve, pile high on a large plate.
ingredients: 1 chicory, shredded,  1 orange, peeled, segmented,  1 tbsp fresh chives, chopped,  handful each fresh chervil and parsley, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil
